CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from o-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| DCB |

The entities that were removed are:

* "hole mobility"
* "pristine"
* "film"
* "spin-cast"
* "solution"
* "on/off ratios"
* "10^5"

These entities do not clearly refer to the name of a material, and therefore were not included in the table.

| --- |
| hole mobility |
| on/off ratios |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "spin" (referring to the spin-casting method)
* "o-dichlorobenzene" (referring to the solvent used for spin-casting)
* "on/off ratios" (referring to the ratio of on/off states of a device)
